column5: I just got an email in my inbox from pizza pizza. I signed up for their email notification on special deals. It's their 40th Anniversary (Pizza Pizza) So if your also turning 40 this year tell them and show some ID and you got a free slice!! I'm just a bit short on this freebie.  There aren't too many freebies out there. Here's the link check it out.  Just incase they are giving away too many .. you didn't hear it from me.  Pizza Pizza Deals   dsn
u just made me hungry for some pizza
Dang, it's a year too late...oh well story of my life  Maureen
... and I would have guessed a few years too early
